items.title: Seahawks mount 16-point comeback, defeat Rams in OT to take over NFC West
items.description: The battle of the NFC West came down to overtime. Here's everything you need to know.

items.title: Canes' Allen out for season after cancer diagnosis
items.description: Miami sophomore forward Marcus Allen has been diagnosed with non-Hodgkin lymphoma and will miss the remainder of the season.
